rules_text:
[i]Sword of the Creator[/i] – When Byleth, Ashen Demon enters, put X +1/+1 counters on her, where X is the number of counters on permanents you control.
[i]Divine Pulse[/i] – Whenever Byleth attacks, double the number of counters on each other permanent you control.
[i]Ashen Demon[/i] – Whenever another permanent with counters on it is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, Byleth deals X damage to target opponent, where X is the number of counters that permanent had on it.
